description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Hua Hin, Thailand. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Idyllic Hua Hin Haven near Khao Takiab Beach with Daily Breakfast, Lunch or Dinner & Cocktails
hotels.description: Let the gentle waves of Khao Takiab’s powder-white shoreline set the pace at this laid-back seaside resort. Just three hours from Bangkok but a world away from the everyday, this family-friendly oasis offers two sparkling pools, a dedicated children’s pool and an enviable location overlooking the glittering Gulf of Thailand - all within easy reach of Hua Hin’s city centre. Start each sun-drenched day with breakfast at Mosaic, where international favourites meet standout Thai cuisine. For a more casual bite, swing past Coral Lounge or when the sun begins to dip, a tropical cocktail calls at Aqua Pool Bar. While it’s tempting to stay seaside, nearby highlights include eclectic night markets and day trips to Kaeng Krachan National Park. Between adventures, Breeze Spa is on hand for adults seeking a little downtime, while the Kids’ Club keeps little ones happily entertained.

hotels.vendor_name: Movenpick Asara Resort & Spa Hua Hin
hotels.title: Tranquil Hua Hin Beachfront Retreat with Lagoon Pool, Onsite Spa & Two Restaurants
hotels.description: Embrace unrivalled Thai elegance and beachfront luxury at this Mövenpick oasis tucked away in the beach town of Hua Hin. Ensconced amid lush tropical gardens and serene lagoon pools, the sprawling resort boasts lavish suites and pool villas, all complemented by signature Mövenpick hospitality. Spend your days swimming laps in the resort's iconic pool, cool off with a drink from the Ocean Bar, tuck into delicious seafood at Baan Dum and try Mediterranean flavours at Kampu Restaurant. If you're looking for some much-needed pampering, unwind with treatments at Asara Spa.

hotels.title: Stylish Oceanfront Hua Hin Hideaway with Glittering Lagoon Pool
hotels.description: Escape to the tranquil Avani+ Hua Hin Resort for an unforgettable beach getaway. Hua Hin is Thailand's latest international hot spot, featuring numerous attractions such as night markets, restaurants, waterparks and shopping centres. The hotel offers gastronomes a diverse range of dining delights at their multiple onsite restaurants as well as plenty of opportunities to bask in the sun, dive into crystal clear waters or enjoy moments of luxury in sophisticated guest rooms.

hotels.title: Tropical Thailand Seaside Sanctuary with Serene Spa
hotels.description: Live like kings and queens gone by at Anantara Hua Hin Resort, a stunning seaside stay set among lush tropical gardens and lotus-filled lagoons just a few hours south of Bangkok. The luxurious and lavish escape offers gastronomes a diverse range of dining delights across its seven restaurants and bars, as well as plenty of opportunities to bask in the sun, dive into crystal clear waters or enjoy moments of luxury at the Anantara Spa.

hotels.vendor_name: Aleenta Hua Hin - Pranburi Resort & Spa
hotels.title: Ultimate Hua Hin Secluded Luxury Near Khao Sam Roi Yot National Park with Onsite Spa
hotels.description: Unwind in the lap of sophistication at the Aleenta property that started it all - the five-star Aleenta Hua Hin - Pranburi Resort & Spa, part of the acclaimed Small Luxury Hotels of the World collection. Nestled in captivating Paknampran Bay, close to Hua Hin town and just 40 minutes from the soaring limestone mountains, otherworldly caves and champagne beaches of Khao Sam Roi Yot National Park, this resort is the ultimate secluded escape overlooking the Gulf of Thailand. Tucked away within Thailand’s historical royal seaside retreat, Hua Hin, and home to just 25 impeccable residences - some just steps from the crystal-clear ocean and others with private plunge pools - this boutique resort is nothing short of spectacular. Let this exquisite hideaway lure you in with an extensive menu of wellness treatments at Ayurah Spa, including nourishing mud treatments, body polishes, therapeutic massages and more. As part of the Ayurah Wellness retreat offerings guests can enjoy complimentary wellness classes along with personalised exercise programs led by trainers.

hotels.vendor_name: V Villas Hua Hin - MGallery Collection
hotels.title: Five-Star Hua Hin Private Pool Villas with Infinity Pool, Spa & Onsite Dining
hotels.description: Discover a world of secluded luxury at this architecturally-designed retreat, a seaside haven located in a town known for its royal heritage, stunning golf courses and vibrant night markets. Nestled along the tranquil Hua Hin Beach, this exquisite sanctuary offers exclusive pool villas, each crafted to provide privacy and world-class comfort. Enjoy round-the-clock butler service, lavish amenities, and direct beach access. Sip on expertly crafted cocktails at Akoya Beach Lounge, enjoy the theatre of an open kitchen at Villazzo, or take a break at La Vie Luxury Coffee & Tea Lounge. Retreat to the hotel's serene spa or take a dip in the infinity pool, complete with spectacular seaside views, or venture out to explore the local area, with Hua Hin’s top attractions-including shopping and water parks - on your doorstep.

hotels.title: Award-Winning Five-Star Hua Hin Hideaway with Oceanside Beach Club & Restaurant
hotels.description: Your next idyllic escape awaits at Putahracsa Hua Hin, a sophisticated beachfront sanctuary boasting five-star bliss along the glistening eastern shores of Thailand, only a few hours from the bustle of Bangkok. Cradled by golden sands and calm waters, this heritage residence boasts an ultra-luxe collection of rooms and villas that perfectly blend Hua Hin's old-world charm with modern, state-of-the-art luxury. Dine among endless ocean vistas at Oceanside Beach Club & Restaurant, unwind with a full body scrub at the Putahrasca DaySpa or slide into one of three tranquil swimming pools, beautifully dotted across the complex. This incredible luxury resort is ranked in the top 1% on Tripadvisor and was named among the Top 25 Luxury Hotels - Thailand at the Travellers' Choice Best of the Best 2020 awards. Draw yourself away from the fabulous resort and you'll find yourself perfectly placed to discover the best of Hua Hin. Once a quiet fishing village, this Thailand hot-spot has blossomed into a lively town brimming with markets, restaurants, waterparks and more. Whether you explore the neighbourhood on a leisurely bike ride, enjoy a horseback ride along the beach or make waves on a jet ski - when you're done exploring you can retreat to your glamorous room, where you’ll enjoy a beautifully designed space with bespoke furniture and tranquil views.

hotels.title: Contemporary Hua Hin Sofitel Beachfront Indulgence with Three Pools, SO/ SPA & Three Restaurants
hotels.description: Embrace signature Sofitel luxury directly on the pristine sands of tranquil Cha-Am beach, perfectly positioned in the family-friendly beach resort town of Hua Hin. Experience a fine blend of playful luxury and effortless elegance as you unwind in the five-star hotel's chic rooms with contemporary interiors and delight in the vast array of amenities to suit guests of all ages. Spend your days soaking up the sun, wade around in the hotel's three pools, including the one-of-a-kind Wet Bubble Pool, pamper yourself with treatments at the SO/ Spa and check into the hip beach club, Beach Society. When you feel peckish, savour Hua Hin's legendary seafood at White Oven or head to SO Sundae for laidback alco popsicles.

hotels.title: Five-Star Beachfront Thailand Oasis in Peaceful Seaside Town
hotels.description: Embrace historic architecture and seaside charm in the stunning InterContinental Hua Hin Resort, an IHG Hotel, set on pristine white sands next to azure waters. Pamper yourself in the tranquil spa, splash around in the deluxe swimming pool, or venture out to explore the bustling town of Hua Hin. Discover delicious seafood cuisine, vibrant night markets, traditional temples and lush golf courses alll within a short distance away, creating plenty of fun-filled moments.

hotels.vendor_name: Veranda Resort & Villas Hua Hin Cha Am
hotels.title: Five-Star Hua Hin Coastal Escape with Private Beach
hotels.description: Dive into unrivalled luxury at Veranda Resort & Villas Hua Hin - Cha Am, an aristocratic-inspired, beachfront sanctuary on the glistening shores of Thailand's coast, just a few hours south of Bangkok. Boasting a fabulous stretch of pristine private beach, this elegant oasis features an ultra-luxe collection of modern, state-of-the-art rooms and extravagant private pool villas that effortlessly encompass Hua Hin's old-world charm. Dine all day at relaxing brasserie, Dining Room, and indulge your senses in an ever-evolving menu of Western and Thai delights while soaking up the gentle sea breeze from the alfresco setting. Take a dip in the infinity pool where you'll find two slides, bubble jets, and a sweeping water curtain, and when it's time to unwind, head to Veranda Spa for a holistic full body massage. When you can draw yourself away, visit Hua Hin, a once quiet fishing village that is now a lively town brimming with markets and restaurants. Whether you explore the neighbourhood on a leisurely bike ride, enjoy a horseback ride along the beach, or make waves on a jet ski, this glamourous resort is the perfect place to base Hua Hin adventures.

hotels.title: Award-Winning Ultra-Cool Hua Hin Five-Star Glamour
hotels.description: Embrace ultra-cool vibes at The Standard, Hua Hin, a glamorous five-star retreat that breathes vibrancy into this charming Thai seaside town. This 1920s Palm Springs-inspired resort features unique touches like rattan interiors, beaming yellow accents and a glitzy schedule of events. Pamper yourself with a holistic treatment at the spa, splash around in the oceanfront swimming pool, or venture out to explore the bustling seaside town.

hotels.title: Boutique Hua Hin Coastal Retreat with Private Beach
hotels.description: Seaside charm comes in waves at Devasom Hua Hin Resort, a boutique resort located on a peaceful stretch of private beach between the Hua Hin and Chaam districts of central Thailand. Just 23 guest rooms and villas make for an intimate escape, perfect for a romantic holiday. Spend your evenings at Deva Bistro, where you can dine on mouthwatering local Thai and western dishes alongside an extensive wine list in a serene, beachside setting. During the day, a range of fabulous facilities promise unforgettable adventures: choose fun-filled watersports, relax with a traditional Thai massage or learn some new skills at the complimentary Thai cooking class (additional charges may apply; bookings required). The resort's location places you in prime position to explore Hua Hin and its many attractions. Keen golfers will enjoy a swing at the Royal Hua Hin Golf Course, just a 15-minute drive away. For a taste of local culture, visit the Hua Hin Night Market and Cicada Market, both approximately a 20-minute drive from the resort. For a day in the sun, the famous Hua Hin Beach is just 15 minutes away by car.
